page.title: 06Oil seed rape
page.content: Oil seed rape is a crop which has recently become more in demand and profitable to produce. It is grown for its{oil content,}which has become more in demand in these times of a health conscious public. The more commonly grown variety produces an oil low in {erucic acid,}which can be used for {human consumption,}such as in margarine, cooking oil and salad oil. The less common variety produces an oil high in erucic acid, used for {industrial lubrication,}particularly in jet engines. The remains are pressed, and the resulting{rape seed {meal}is used in cow cake and pig meal. The straw is used for cattle bedding. Although the crop was known in Biblical times, new varieties mean that it can be grown in our climate with increasing success.
